# Inter-Item Gap Support

**API Collection**

Constant for supporting inter-item gaps.

## Constants

- **elementKindInterItemGapIndicator**: The element kind string assigned to the attributes object when it represents an inter-item gap.

## Constants

- **NSCollectionElementCategory**: Constants specifying the type of element in the collection view.

items.description: The element kind string assigned to the attributes object when it represents an inter-item gap.
